******************************************************
Test #1:
 
Code:

call initAtomistic()
call readDetectionData(trim(misc%simname)//'_detection')
call processDetectionData()
call processBalt()
call prettyPrintRealMat(detection%Balt(:,:,1),'Balt1')
call prettyPrintRealMat(detection%Balt(:,:,4),'Balt4')

Output: (Should be mirror images...also, checked by hand)
 Balt1
  -1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000     
  0.50000000000000000        0.0000000000000000       -1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000       0.50000000000000000        0.0000000000000000     
   0.0000000000000000       -1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        1.0000000000000000     
   0.0000000000000000       0.50000000000000000        0.0000000000000000       -1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000       0.50000000000000000     
 Balt4
   1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000       -1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000     
 -0.50000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000      -0.50000000000000000        0.0000000000000000     
   0.0000000000000000        1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000       -1.0000000000000000     
   0.0000000000000000      -0.50000000000000000        0.0000000000000000        1.0000000000000000        0.0000000000000000      -0.50000000000000000
